definition: Pingluo county in Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Pingluo county in Shizuishan 石嘴山[Shi2 zui3 shan1], Ningxia

sentences.english: Sha river lies in the county in Ningxia, capital of Yinchuan City from 47 km.
sentences.chinese: 沙湖位於寧夏平羅縣境內，距首府銀川市47公里。
